article.title: ISMB2011 Slides
article.content:
[[   

Slides for for 10 of the Galaxy-related presentations at [ISMB/ECCB/BOSC 2011](/src/events/ISMB-ECCB-BOSC 2011/index.md) are [now available online](/src/events/ISMB-ECCB-BOSC 2011/index.md). Presentations include:

  • Enacting Taverna Workflows through Galaxy
  • Enabling NGS Analysis with(out) the Infrastructure
  • SymD server: a platform for detecting internally symmetric protein structures

plus many more.

Dave Clements
